mapper.update: update parking_space set station_type = #{stationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_area = #{stationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_no = #{stationNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, station_type, station_area, station_no, is_del, create_time, update_time from parking_space order by id desc
